Attention Check Page A

This is a quality control page. If you see this message, please select Option A as the winner in ALL dimensions for this question.

Verification Code: AC-A-001

data:text/html,

Attention Check Page B

This is a quality control page. You should NOT select this option. Please select Option A as the winner in all dimensions.

Verification Code: AC-B-001

items.prompt: Please select Option A for all questions in this group to help us verify data quality

Verification Code: DQC-A-002

prompt: To verify you are reading carefully, please choose Option B for ALL dimensions in this comparison

prompt: Please spend at least 30 seconds reviewing both options before making your evaluation

items.prompt: Please spend at least 30 seconds reviewing both options before making your evaluation
items.link1:
data:text/html,

Time Check Interface A

Please take your time to carefully review this interface. Spend at least 30 seconds examining both options.

Time Check - Option A

This interface includes:

  • Clear navigation structure
  • Intuitive layout design
  • Responsive user interface
  • Comprehensive feature set
  • Accessible design patterns
items.link2:

Time Check Interface B

Please take adequate time to evaluate this interface thoroughly. Remember to spend at least 30 seconds on your review.

Time Check - Option B

This interface features:

  • Modern visual design
  • Streamlined user experience
  • Interactive components
  • Mobile-optimized layout
  • Enhanced performance metrics
